pages.title: Uranium Vein
pages.text: Uranium Vein is a Vein that become available late game Vein with medium reserves.
Main Ore:Uranium$(br)Associated Ores:Redstone$(br2)Heights:15-38$(br2)Vein Spreadth:Medium$(br)Vein Density:Dense$(br2)Indicator:Iolite Glow Rose$(br)Vein Rarity:Rare$(br2)Dimension:Twilight Forest
